data.event: It remained sparsely populated for decades, retaining much of its natural bushland.

event.title: the construction of multiple buildings of the Sleeman Centre for the 1982

data.event: This lack of population motivated the construction of multiple buildings of the Sleeman Centre for the 1982 Commonwealth Games.

event.title: housed the suburb's only significant structures until 2010

data.event: The Sleeman Centre housed the suburb's only significant structures until 2010, when the former suburb of Capalaba West became incorporated into Chandler.
